channel.title: Nerdy on tedn.life
channel.description: Recent content in Nerdy on tedn.life

item.title: The vertical bar screen of death ... the story of an unexpected win-win
item.description: Last year I spend some time and money to “renovate” my old 17-inch Macbook Pro (remember the good old times … when Apple was building good laptops with great keyboards and no touchbar :)). For the last 6 month I was running VirtualBox on it hosting an Ubuntu image. That kind of worked (a little bit slow at times and managing the ports was (sometimes) challenging, but otherwise … ok).
